Original: That request, hmm? The man sitting
over there is the client? Do you see
him? The showy, flashy explorer?
[Page]
He calls himself the "lonely monster
hunter." *sigh* Anyone with the nerve
to call themselves that is...
[Page]
In any case, you should talk to him.
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your hasty return.
Translation: That request, hmm? The man sitting
over there is the client? Do you see
him? The showy, flashy explorer?
[Page]
He calls himself the "lonely monster
hunter." *sigh* Anyone with the nerve
to call themselves that is...
[Page]
In any case, you should talk to him.
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your hasty return.

Original: Well done in completing that request.
You did another fine job.
[Page]
That "lonely hunter," however, looks
rather the worse for wear. I cannot
believe he thinks himself skilled...
[Page]
Nor can I believe he was willing to
pay to show off. How drunk can a man
become on his ego?
[Page]
I am grateful that you would bother
to clear out his request... Here is
the so-called hunter's reward.
Translation: Well done in completing that request.
You did another fine job.
[Page]
That "lonely hunter," however, looks
rather the worse for wear. I cannot
believe he thinks himself skilled...
[Page]
Nor can I believe he was willing to
pay to show off. How drunk can a man
become on his ego?
[Page]
I am grateful that you would bother
to clear out his request... Here is
the so-called hunter's reward.

Original: You arrive at the specified meeting
location, but the client is nowhere
to be seen.
[Page]
If you wish to rendezvous with the
client, you will need to return at
[Color:5]night[Color:0], as he specified.
Translation: You arrive at the specified meeting
location, but the client is nowhere
to be seen.
[Page]
If you wish to rendezvous with the
client, you will need to return at
[Color:5]night[Color:0], as he specified.

Original: You arrive at the specified meeting
location, but the client is nowhere
to be seen.
[Page]
Just as you begin to wonder what is
going on, you hear a man's scream
amid the sound of bushes rustling!
[Page]
You squint to see through the darkness
and vaguely make out a man's shape,
pursued by giant monsters!
[Page]
It is your client...!
[Page]
He is clearly in need of immediate
assistance, though you may wish to
hold off until you are prepared...
Translation: You arrive at the specified meeting
location, but the client is nowhere
to be seen.
[Page]
Just as you begin to wonder what is
going on, you hear a man's scream
amid the sound of bushes rustling!
[Page]
You squint to see through the darkness
and vaguely make out a man's shape,
pursued by giant monsters!
[Page]
It is your client...!
[Page]
He is clearly in need of immediate
assistance, though you may wish to
hold off until you are prepared...

Original: [Color:5]Challenge the monsters?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Challenge the monsters?[Color:0]

Original: Slaying the monsters was not part of
the request. Realizing that, you elect
to watch the client flee in terror.
Translation: Slaying the monsters was not part of
the request. Realizing that, you elect
to watch the client flee in terror.

Original: After you confirm the monsters'
deaths and sheathe your weapons, the
client ambles out, cracking jokes.
[Page]
He claims that he set the monster's
favorite food here in order to ambush
it by night, but his scheme failed.
[Page]
He tells you the monster likes eating
[Color:5][Item:2049][Color:0], [Color:5][Item:2050][Color:0],
and [Color:5][Item:2051][Color:0].
[Page]
You meet the client's excuses with a
cold stare. He eventually exhibits
shame and meekly hangs his head.
[Page]
The client thanks you, apologizes,
and trudges back to his own skyship.
[Page]
You witnessed no "miracle" here, but
the request is complete regardless.
You should report back to the bar.
Translation: After you confirm the monsters'
deaths and sheathe your weapons, the
client ambles out, cracking jokes.
[Page]
He claims that he set the monster's
favorite food here in order to ambush
it by night, but his scheme failed.
[Page]
He tells you the monster likes eating
[Color:5][Item:2049][Color:0], [Color:5][Item:2050][Color:0],
and [Color:5][Item:2051][Color:0].
[Page]
You meet the client's excuses with a
cold stare. He eventually exhibits
shame and meekly hangs his head.
[Page]
The client thanks you, apologizes,
and trudges back to his own skyship.
[Page]
You witnessed no "miracle" here, but
the request is complete regardless.
You should report back to the bar.

Original: It does not seem the monster will
appear here again for some time.
You should report back to the bar.
Translation: It does not seem the monster will
appear here again for some time.
You should report back to the bar.
